# userInfo

**Instance Property**

A dictionary you use to customize decoding by providing contextual information.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency var userInfo: [CodingUserInfoKey : any Sendable] { get set }
```

## Customizing Decoding

- **decode(_:from:format:)**: Returns a value of the specified type by decoding a property list using the supplied format.

items.description: Returns a value of the specified type by decoding a property list using the supplied format.
items.name: decode(_:from:format:)
